name: Pick Up This Trash
description:
I made this game for a game jam and the theme was "Power in Numbers"

But this is my first game, and it's very disappointing that initially I thought that the theme was to make a game with a gradually dimming screen, because I didn’t go into the discussions because I don’t know, that’s why the game doesn’t really match the theme, but I like this result, let he's buggy, but cool. And yes, there is no victory scene in the game because you won't win anyway :)
